content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > join the sweet bee crochet facebook > community click here 1 the festive holiday bauble is a great stash buster project that uses worsted weight yarn and a 4mm or 5mm hook your preference it works up quickly and makes a great gift idea *as of october 13th 2022 this pattern has received an update to reflect the current layout and format of my recent designs * **inside the pattern you will find ** * detailed written instructions * special stitch tutorial * clear photos * required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** * approximately 19-20 yards total of worsted weight yarn in two colours referred to as colour a and colour b i used bernat handicrafter cotton * 4mm hook or 5mm hook * yarn needle * scissors **this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products ** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
